text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews I just saw a tweet from a young girl, who said she just lost her mother due to the Coronavirus. And this is what you’re tweeting? Americans are DYING!!! And you’re complaining Fox isn’t being nice to you? SHUT THE MOTHER FUCKING UP!!!!!!!!!!!!
